content: v st * around to the end join to * instructions to repeat the 3rd chain |25 v s| fo / fasten_off round 18 ch1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in each chsp and st around to the end join to the first st with a slip_stitch |75sc| links / socials fo/ weave email yourlovegetsmail@gmail com h hook - make a chain as long as desired for the drawstring and text only 973-974-9997 weave through the last row of v stitches mine was 54 you can scan for other patterns/tutorials add beads to each end of the drawstring for an extra /youtube embellishment but it s not crucial to the design to cover longer or thicker hair you can continue repeating round 7 to the desired length and/or use a larger hook to make it longer and wider enjoy
